DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate quality life long-term gynecologic cancer survivor .
DOC.detailed_description: Since early 1970s , death rate major gynecological tumor significantly decline , reduction 42 % endometrial , 49 % cervix , 27 % vagina vulva , 11 % ovarian cancer . Thus , approximately 82,000 new gynecologic case year , woman live , necessarily force cope psychological behavioral morbidity . Psychosocial data cancer patient portray significant fear anxiety diagnosis treatment potential high level psychological sexual morbidity . While many study do investigate sexual outcome , little data available basic domain quality life , i.e . emotional social adjustment , occupational outcome , aspect physical health might influence quality life gynecologic cancer survivor . There need basic descriptive research area , particularly investigation include representative sample differ socioeconomic racial/ethnic group . The goal propose study evaluate quality life long-term gynecologic cancer survivor . The specific aim : 1 . Describe quality life ( mental health physical functioning component ) , stress , sexual functioning among survivor gynecologic malignancy 2 . Describe difference disease site group ( i.e . cervical , endometrial , ovarian , vulva ) . It show cancer group improvement mood cop achieve brief , cost effective intervention ( e.g . ten therapy hour delivery group format ) . These multi-modal intervention stress reduction , disease/treatment information , cognitive behavioral coping strategy , social support . There suggestive evidence disease specific intervention , include sexual therapy gynecologic patient , result improvement well . Research focus issue aid availability reliable valid strategy assess quality life ( SF-36 ; FACT ) sexuality . Before clinical trial undertaken , research must provide comprehensive assessment quality life gynecologic cancer survivor .
